effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Has the same type as the user.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might. This move becomes the same type as the user's type.
